plugins.name: math
plugins.description: Perform basic math operations: add, subtract, multiply, divide

plugins.name: result-handler
plugins.description: Handle actions on chat results like opening directories, files, or URLs

plugins.name: weather
plugins.description: Get weather for a given location

plugins.name: music-project-manager
plugins.description: Manage music projects: create projects, open existing projects, scan for .RPP files, list existing projects, filter recent projects, and view settings

plugins.name: ori-meta-threads-manager
plugins.description: Manage Meta Threads posts: create text posts, post with media, get profile info, and manage authentication

plugins.name: ori_reaper
plugins.description: Manage REAPER ReaScripts: list available scripts, launch them, add new scripts, delete them, download scripts from repository, or configure setup
